resources.string: This is the simple mobile application for estimating zakat payment for gold keeping and wearing.
This page estimate zakat payment for gold wearing category. Below here are the additional information:
1. Uruf (normal rate of wear gold jewelry) - 200 gram 2. Percentage of Zakat Payable - 25%
This page estimate zakat payment for gold keeping category. Below here are the additional information:
1. Uruf (normal rate of keep gold jewelry) - 85 gram 2. Percentage of Zakat Payable - 25%
